locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: If you don‚Äôt have pilots points rewards why this shop works like a pilot, I was trying to get a shower but paying when we bought a lot of diesel with them, they said its impossible get a shower, only if I pay, really? With more than 5 ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ my sandwich had no clue what he was doing, then the I'm guessing manager took over and they bickered like two high school girls. The bathrooms were nasty and I didn't risk the clap for a shower. My suggestion? Go to flying J off of 524.

Great group of people, I stop here at least twice a week. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience. Always welcoming day or night. There very little parking available for trucks. Restrooms and shower are small however well maintained.

It easy a nice place they have a subway inside that has good food. They have bathroom and showers. I didn't use those but they are there if needed. They have a good size convenience store as well and gas. It has room for big trucks and they ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ There's always an FHP officer up there if you need help, if you're planning on doing dirt of any kind stay away! Also, it's a truck stop so they have a shower and other amenities that you can use here! Correction Subway is no longer 24/7üíØ‚úåüèæ ‚Ä¶

Driving from NY to southern FL I really needed a shower. I never used a truck stop shower before. It was clean, big and so worth the 12.00 I paid. There is no time limit. They have towels for you to use. There is also soap to wash up with. ‚Ä¶

Wanted to stop for a few hours sleep and a shower in the morning.  Was run off by cop hovering on the lot. This place is small and inhospitable.  It may bear the company name, but it IS NOT a Pilot Travel Center!  Don't waste your time ‚Ä¶

Unprofessional/Rude Staff, Nasty Restrooms, Outdated, I've tried to get a shower here 4 times and each time it was either cold or room temp, when I go tell the manager they won't refund my shower credit. I will never come here again.

The bathrooms were clean, but for anyone trying to shower, the temperature was freezing to slightly less cold. Regardless the water was extremely cold and I had a stained towel. Extremely disappointed with this Pilot.
Super tiny spot. Not able to purchase a shower cuz I was parked on side. Cashier refuse to give me a shower . Poor customer service

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ in love‚Äôs - the workers were friendly and the store was clean. freshly ground coffee was delicious üòägreat gift selections! (i would have given a five but worker opened shower door while still inside - please knock before opening to clean!) ‚Ä¶
Clean bathroom and shower, water pressure weak though. Only one washer is working for laundry üòÇ  other then that good location ‚Ä¶
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

This is by far the nicest truck stop I've been too with my truck driver and we travel the East Coast (Upstate NY to FL and TX). Nice clean store, facilities and the shower was Great! Hot water, good pressure and super clean. They have a lot ‚Ä¶

I am a truck driver and on Friday night 11/17/23 at 10pm I went in to get a shower and all I had was a picture of my card on my phone (due to not being able to get into my app and lost my card) and I went to get a shower and the guy behind ‚Ä¶

Nice and clean! Had a great shower with hot water and excellent pressure. Also highly recommend getting in line for shower via the app, makes the wait much more tolerable. Only had to wait about 10 minutes on a Friday evening. Definitely ‚Ä¶
Loves have always been a great place for truckers to stop by get some diesel fuel and grab a quick shower ‚Ä¶
Thankful to this team for the way they kept the shower line moving. Then Miss Eartha at the Hardee's has great customer service skills
Another badly ran love's where they wait until every shower is dirty then decided to clean them
Great place to get gas, take a shower, and spend the night
good truck stop, very clean restroom and shower!)

showerReviews.reviewText: I think it's really stupid to leave $5 in cash for a shower. The ATM was broken, and I couldn't do it because of stupid policies (I could have left my watch or something else while I showered).

‚Ä¶ in picking fights than actually helping. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre covering up their own miserable lives by taking it out on those of us just trying to get fuel, a shower, or a place to rest. It‚Äôs unacceptable and downright disrespectful. ‚Ä¶

Originally walked in everything was cool some dude showed me the shower it was clean but then I went out to purchase a shower the attendant told me I had to put the deposit in cash so I have to go out and get cash or else pay $6 to take out ‚Ä¶
Zero human compassion, drove 30 mins to get here. Dont take tap to pay an want a $5 deposit on a 15 dollar shower. Lady had an attitude. Im a southern gentleman who shows EVERYONE RESPECT. TERRIBLE

No signage...wanted dinner and a shower and was rushed while eating because free hour was at 40 min and was told if i go over ill have to pay 19.for the night wich i was not going to stay..i mean if you are consuming cut some slack i was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ by this truck stop because it was the only one in Orlando and being that. It's the only one in orlando here.Charge astronomical prices on a lot of things. They're shower. Is $15? Which is not a bad price, but you have to have $5 cash. In ‚Ä¶
Good place to park,shower, and food. They have  a Grillers restaurant in truck stop good Puerto Rican food.
A small peaceful stop with the amenities needed. The staff was helpful and friendly and we enjoyed our stay here even though parking and the shower was quite expensive.

Super! Paid parking, laundry, shower. Ran into a small problem with my laundry and the owner took care of it immediately. Hard to find a nice truck stop in Orlando. I‚Äôve used mudflap with them before too. Once I‚Äôm ready to leave I‚Äôll fill ‚Ä¶

First Time visiting the city and needed to take a cold ü•∂ shower üöø good that I found this place, very reasonable price. The lady that attended me in the front desk explained how it works. Everything was good, it just feel and see that ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great spot for a stop! Plenty of clean stalls and plenty of items including necessities! Have been stopping here for years and will continue regardless of the new stations popping up.

Another great T/A, clean inside and out, friendly, professional team. This T/A has a Subway, Popeyes & a Country Pride Restaurant. There is a Game Room, Laundry Room. Definitely a great place to stop on your travels!

First visit was great, nice store and clean showers plus a clean truck lot. Second visit, showers were shutdown because nobody could clean them, three employees in the store and none of them can clean showers. Showers were shut down all night and well into the morning.

I would have gave 5 stars but country pride you need to do better or close. Showers was clean and store was clean with great cashiers. Country pride I have a second chance and you failed bigger this time. Waitress didn‚Äôt want to be bothered ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was clean with lots of hot water and decent water pressure. ‚Ä¶

Tiffany, Tara, and Paul were very helpful. They were quite hospitable in seeing that a reserved parking spot was made available and then making a shower available. All of them were professional, courteous, friendly, and provided excellent ‚Ä¶

Limited parking for trucks... everything is kind of new. Lots of businesses around it. I like it, but driver lounge needs improvement... showers... restrooms...dirty. I took a shower and it was dirty. What do I mean? Understand drivers go ‚Ä¶
Nice friendly staff, clean store and restrooms.  Didn't get to shower here tho. Maybe next time. I will definitely be back!

Shower guy that cleans the place would rather talk to everyone beside do is damn job and clean 10 people in line watched 4 people come out the shower while waiting and he just stand there talking to his buddies instead of working

Ridiculous store. Been waiting 35 minutes for a shower with one person ahead of me and it‚Äôs 4 empty bathroom ready to be clean and nobody cares. I ask to the  cashier and she said that they are a LITTLE BEHIND

Shower was clean and nice and hot, but the 3rd shift cashier took so long to print a fuel receipt that I gave up and walked out without buying anything. What have been different if every other employee wasn't somewhere else at the time.

I haven‚Äôt been inside yet to take my shower but this is in the parking lot. It‚Äôs disgusting and behind my truck my husband went to walk Tuxedo this morning and noticed very foul smell and piss jugs every where. Tuxedo went to examine the ‚Ä¶

Staff here does not care, they were chatting amongst each other and ignoring a full line of customers. The line for the shower was abysmal, and the shower itself was cold!
Also, no cold drinks. Their ooler unit is broken.
Showers are always a mess. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: 6 of 7 shower are not clean , people weit in line . There is 4 employees and nobody whana clean showers.after 30 min some guy show up , he was clean outside, but no one from inside whana help him ‚Ä¶

First off very impressed with the cleanliness of the bathrooms and the shower stalls‚Ä¶ The water was also soft, not hard and full of chlorine like some of them‚Ä¶ they offered me an extra towel in case I needed to bathe my animal.. also, they ‚Ä¶
If your a trucker don't go here they have only 2 hour parking and will tow you, imagine taking a shower and eating only to find your shit gets towed not fun.
I'm giving this five stars because they have cinnabon and shower stall number one was amazing..
Sprinter van parking gets tight so arrive early. On the other hand, cleanest shower/bath combo I've seen in a LONG time. Pleasantly surprised!

‚Ä¶ other truck stops but they can still be hit or miss. That being said, this was one of the best we‚Äôve been to. Shower was modern and clean, had good water pressure and water got very hot. But the main reason for the 5 stars is that we went ‚Ä¶
A drunken man who deals with showers probably sold my shower to a homeless person. How is it possible that I buy a shower and it‚Äôs already occupied by someone else?

‚Ä¶ store. Staff are always walking around the parking lot and store so it's a very safe place. They have really great food and the showers are awesome. If you like to travel and find yourself in Cocoa Florida stop on in have some of the great ‚Ä¶

Every day we are worried about covid. I did not check ever area of this store. We were in and out with a shower and refreshments.  The staff is clearly trying. The shower was one of the cleanest we have seen and everything in the ‚Ä¶

Tiffy tiffy tiffy ...I gotcha come 0800 when corporate clocks in ... AND the showers suck feels like your washing your body with baby oil or lotion they must treat the water because there's so many disgusting roaches everywhere in florida ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ was closed when we got there. Almost didn't see the sign to pay $9 for the night. There is one bathroom that both men and women use with a shower in it. Didn't use it so I don't know the cost of the shower. There seemed to be a fair amount ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ My husband and I made a quick stop for a shower, and was charged for  $10.00 for 2 showers which they only had one. Then when I asked the lady who took our money she said well he (my husband) asked for 2 like she wasn't aware that it was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 5$ shower and this is the place those crocs come in handy. Not clean and deff not kept up with but a warm shower after working all day did what it needed to do.....store closes at 8pm and they lock the gate to the shower and bathroom...yes ‚Ä¶

Zellwood diner next to truck stop is good.$9/day to park. Approximately 20 spots. Truck stop closed at 7pm along with the 1 unisex bathroom/shower
3 stars because of the diner only.
$13.00 to park. $5 to shower. Only one shower, bring your own towels and shower shoes.

‚Ä¶ stop. Check the expiration date on snacks, I bought some ships that were 2 years expired, notics after eating them. It has one shower, very dirty must of the time. Jt has a Cat Scale and a restauranr, never tried the food. I'm giving ‚Ä¶
I drove an hour here for a shower and they wouldn't let me take one cuz their register was down. I don't think I would've showered there anyways.  Looked filthy.
Perfect good parking great shower
Shower is horrible
